p: Reciprocal plots were performed to determine the inhibitory parameters of three active MPPs (Zn, Co, and Sn) ( Figure 3A– C, respectively) for genotype 1B. These plots demonstrated that enzymatic inhibition was basically competitive and all three MPPs showed similar Ki (0.48, 0.43 and 1.7 µM, ZnPP, CoPP, and SnPP respectively).
